detectors.description:
DreamUSDCLP.earned(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DreamUSDCLP.sol#718-726) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-balanceOf(account).mul(rewardPerToken().sub(userRewardPerTokenPaid[account])).div(1e18).mul(getTotalMultiplier(account)).div(1e18).add(rewards[account]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DreamUSDCLP.sol#719-725)
